Experiment_description: The experiments involved establishing a baseline for Symbolic Pattern Recognition (SPR) using a neural bag-of-embeddings MLP model. Sequences of shape and color tokens were embedded and classified, focusing on metrics such as Shape-Weighted Accuracy (SWA), Color-Weighted Accuracy (CWA), and their harmonic mean (HWA).
Significance: These experiments are crucial as they set a neural baseline for SPR tasks, providing insights into the model's ability to generalize and recognize patterns. They pave the way for integrating symbolic components to enhance zero-shot generalization, contributing to advancements in sequence-classification tasks.
Description: The methods involved embedding sequences of shape and color tokens and using a neural bag-of-embeddings MLP model for classification. Metrics tracked included cross-entropy loss, SWA, CWA, and HWA. The experiments adhered to device guidelines, running on GPU when available.

List_of_included_plots.description: The plot indicates that both training and validation loss decrease rapidly in the first two epochs and then stabilize at a similar value.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: This suggests that the model converges quickly and does not overfit, indicating effective learning and generalization.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot shows the training and validation loss over five epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The slight increase in validation loss after the third epoch suggests potential overfitting, warranting further attention to regularization.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot tracks the evolution of three metrics (SWA, CWA, HWA) over epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The metrics improve significantly by epoch 4, suggesting optimal performance and good generalization capability.

Key_numerical_results.analysis: Indicates the model's stronger performance in recognizing shape variety.
Slightly higher SWA suggests better shape recognition in this node, despite overfitting concerns.
Consistent performance in shape tasks, balanced with other metrics, indicating robust baseline.
